text: Ona strive zapricinit GOD ona strive Jeho zapricinit. He zvolit si ona nie miesto hardship ona practicing tvoj nabozenstvo! -Nabozenstvo z tvoj otca Abraham. He bol 1 kto vola sa ona Submitters originally! Thus posol serve svedok ona ona serve svedok among the ludia. Therefore ona observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) hold chytro GOD He bol tvoj Lord lepsie Lord lepsie Supporter
